com.axelor.studio.service

Class MenuRecorderService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.axelor.studio.service.MenuRecorderService

  • public class MenuRecorderService
extends java.lang.Object
    This service class generate menu from MenuEditor. It will also create action-view required for menu.
    Author:
    axelor

    • Method Detail

      • record

        public void record(java.io.File parentPath,
          boolean updateMeta)
            throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException,
                   java.io.IOException
        Root method to access this service. It generate MetaMenu and save menuitems in menu.xml
        Parameters:
        parentPath - Path to resources directory of custom module.
        updateMeta - Boolean to check if only to update meta records.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - Exception throws in parsing xml .
        java.io.IOException - Exception throws in saving menu.xml.

      • updateEdited

        public void updateEdited(java.util.List<MenuEditor> menuEditors,
                boolean updateMeta)
        Method to reset edited boolean after processing MenuEditors.
        Parameters:
        menuEditors - List of MenuEditors to process.
        updateMeta - Boolean to check if to update recorded boolean too.

      • loadFile

        private void loadFile(java.io.File menuFile)
               throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException,
                      java.io.IOException
        Load existing menu file from custom module's resource directory. It create list of menuItems and update actionMap.
        Parameters:
        menuFile - MenuFile in resource directory.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - Exception thrown in parsing xml.
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown in saving xml file.

      • extractMenu

        public void extractMenu(java.util.Iterator<MenuEditor> iterator)
        Method create MenuItem from MenuEditor record.
        Parameters:
        iterator - MenuEditor iterator

      • setAction

        private void setAction(MenuEditor menuEditor,
             com.axelor.meta.schema.views.MenuItem menuItem)
        Method set action in menuItem from MenuEditor and update actionMap.
        Parameters:
        menuEditor - MenuEditor source to create action.
        menuItem - MenuItem to update.

      • setGroup

        private void setGroup(MenuEditor menuEditor,
            com.axelor.meta.schema.views.MenuItem menuItem)
        Method set MenuItem groups from menuEditor's groups M2M.
        Parameters:
        menuEditor - MenuEditor source
        menuItem - Destination MenuItem to update

      • getAction

        private com.axelor.meta.schema.actions.Action getAction(MenuEditor menuEditor)
        Method create ActionView from MenuEditor.
        Parameters:
        menuEditor - Source MenuEditor.
        Returns:
        New ActionView created.

      • generatatMetaMenu

        public void generatatMetaMenu(java.util.Iterator<MenuEditor> menuIterator)
        Create or update MetaMenu from MenuEditor and save it. Also set action in MetaMenu.
        Parameters:
        menuIterator - MenuEditor iterator

      • getMetaAction

        public com.axelor.meta.db.MetaAction getMetaAction(MenuEditor menuEditor)
        Create or Update MetaAction from menuEditor record and save it.
        Parameters:
        menuEditor - Source menuEditor
        Returns:
        New or existing MetaAction

      • writeMenu

        private void writeMenu(java.io.File menuFile)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
        Method write menu file. Using menuItems and action Map. It will write xml with menuitem and action-views in menuFile.
        Parameters:
        menuFile - Destination menu file to update.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown by file writing.
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - Exception thrown by xml marshal.

      • deleteMenu

        public void deleteMenu(MenuEditor menuEditor)
        Method delete MetaMenu related MetaAction and MenuEditor if boolean 'deleteMenu' set true in MenuEditor. This boolean set when any workflow deleted which is related to menu.
        Parameters:
        menuEditor - MenuEditor to delete.
